knimeNode.name: File Download
knimeNode.shortDescription: Provides a download link to a file.

intro.p: Provides a link with a downloadable file. The user needs to select a string flow variable pointing to an existing file. This node is typically connected to a file writer (e.g. CSV writer), whereby the writer exposes its destination file as variable that is selected in this node's configuration dialog.

fullDescription.option: A descriptive label that will be shown.
Some lines of description that will be shown in the remote control form, for instance by means of a tooltip.
Title for the link shown in the Web Portal
A name for the output resource, used for web service calls.
Select the name of the variable whose value points to the download file.

ports.inPort: Variable input with the given path variable defined.
